full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SA LAM GYI RNAM BZHAG THEG GSUM MDZES RGYAN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @020A *, ,(CES SA LAM GYI RNAM BZHAG THEG GSUM MDZES RGYAN ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, AA LAG SHA NAS BYANG PHYOGS SKYE DGU'I 'DREN MCHOG DAM PAR GYUR BA KUN GROL NO MON HAN RIN PO CHES, BKRA SHIS PA'I LHA RDZAS, DNGUL GYI MAndAL DANG BCAS BSKUL NGOR, BTZUN PA DKON MCHOG 'JIGS MED DBANG POS SBYAR BA'O, ,) `AOm SVA STI, BYANG CHEN THAR PA'I LAM DU BGROD PA'I TSUL, ,GSAL MDZAD NYI MA THEG GSUM MDZES RGYAN 'DI, ,YON GNAS BYANG PHYOGS AU CU MU CHEN SHOG ,SPRUL MING YE SHES TSUL KHRIMS RGYAL MTSAN GYIS, ,MTHUN RKYEN SBYAR TE PAR DU BSKRUN PA'I DGES, ,MKHA' MNYAM LUS CAN KUN LA PHAN PA DANG, ,KHYAD PAR 'JAM DPAL SNYING PO'I BSTAN PA MCHOG ,MI NUB KUN TU DAR ZHING RGYAS GYUR CIG ,(PAR 'DI 'GYUR PHYED MI TSAN DU ZHUGS, ,)
